title: New Ranked System
body:
Holy shit.. I can't get over the lockin function and how infuriating it is.

The fact you actually have to lock in a champion now is pissing me off, my behavior is so locked in to the old ranked system and when you don't hit lock in you get kicked with a 5 minute ban even though you've chosen a champion... I wait until the clock ticks down to make a decision and not realizing you have to lock in now.. 30 minute ban yesterday for doing it twice in a fucking row.  And u even get marked as a loss in promos...

I don't know if its been changed in this new patch but i used to browse around FB or youtube until it was my turn to pick and the client would come to the front of my screen.
Now it's pay attention all the way through lobby or eat a 5 minute ban.
